ygData.subject: Re: Re: AC Dilemma [and other misc stuff]
ygData.msgSnippet: How did you get your Lambent - did you buy them outright?  Buy rights to looting the lore items or what?  How much did you pay? Thanks Slyde ... From: Chris
ygData.messageBody:
How did you get your Lambent - did you buy them outright? Buy rights to
looting the lore items or what? How much did you pay?

Thanks

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: Chris Musson <oblivious_the_mighty_confused@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 08, 1999 9:23 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: AC Dilemma [and other misc stuff]


> From: Chris Musson <oblivious_the_mighty_confused@...>
>
> Slyde,
>
> My personal opinion is skip the steel. You have 850 plat. that is enough
$ to
> start getting lambent. I am only lvl 23 and i have 2 lambent bracers and
the
> lambent [arms]. I also have the Black Silk Gloves (looted last
night..first
> time in mistmoore) and a lambent stone....hopefully i will get the shin
> gauntlets soon. My biggest problem has been the money, which you have
got. I

Griffenne
> Charm at Loc XXXX, XXXX".
